articles.title: Dementia care: Sleep disturbances, memory loss and difficulty planning are key early signs - Express
articles.description: DEMENTIA care: Research shows there are more than 850,000 people in the UK who have dementia. One in 14 people over the age of 65 have dementia, and the condition affects one in 6 people over 80. Being able to spot the early signs will help with earlier treat…
